pages.text: Masks make it so your actions only affect certain blocks, regardless of command or action.

$(li)$(l)//gmask dirt$()$(br) global mask that only affects dirt $(br)$(li)$(l)//mask dirt$()$(br) the held brush only affects dirt $(br)$(li)$(l)//gmask ~oak_log$()$(br) affects blocks next to oak log $(br)$(li)$(l)//gmask >dirt$()$(br) affects blocks on top of dirt

$(li)$(l)//gmask <dirt$()$(br) affects blocks below dirt $(br)$(li)$(l)//gmask dirt,stone$()$(br) affects dirt or stone (a comma = or) $(br)$(li)$(l)//gmask /[0d][30d]$()$(br) affects slopes from 0-30 degrees $(br)$(li)$(l)//gmask $river$()$(br) affects things inside a river biome
